titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to They Meet Again: "The Re-unions" of the New York State Volunteers' 114th Regiment, "The Chenango Unit"
titlestmt.author: Pamela Cooley

did.unittitle: They Meet Again: "The Re-unions" of the New York State Volunteers' 114th Regiment, "The Chenango Unit" manuscripts.

processinfo.p: The processing, cataloging, and encoding of this collection were made possible by a grant from the Gladys Krieble Delmas.

accessrestrict.p: Coll. No. 453 is open for research according to the regulations of Fenimore Art Museum Library.
accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions

bioghist.p: Patricia F. Scott was City Historian of Norwich, NY from 1992-2006.
bioghist.head: Biography/History

controlaccess.subject: United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865
United States--History--Civil War--Regimental histories--New York Infantry Regiment, 114th (1862-1865).

scopecontent.p: Contains the original copy of the 1,108 page manuscript for "They Meet Again: 'The Re-Unions' of the New York State Volunteers' 114th Regiment, 'The Chenango Unit' by Norwich, NY City Historian, Patricia F. Scott. Reunions numbers 1 (1873) - 46 (1918) are documented.
scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
